name: Hose Wrangler
description:
Hose Wrangler is the one and only fast-paced arcade game where you get to control a factory worker named Hattie.  You need to have excellent hand-eye coordination ninja skills to quickly wrangle hoses and feed mushrooms to a very hungry wombat named Womby or be defeated by its vicious bite.

You can customize Hattie with the twelve custom hats that are unlocked in the customization screen.

Do you have the ninja skills it takes to survive and wrangle hoses so you can get a high score?

The fate of Hattie is in your hands!
